description: monkey in blue shirt and red pants sitting with right leg crossed over left on green raised seat on top of rectangular box; open design on three sides of box; design of organ and organic design on front side below "ORGANIC BANK"; handle on proper left side of box
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

On front side below top edge in relief: [ORGAN BANK]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [# 194.7 2 (in circle) / 74175 150 (with two lines on 150) / \"Organ Bank\" / Monkey 150 / 179M 4200]
title: "Organ Bank, Monkey" mechanical bank
